Pre-Game Insights: India stands tall with eight wins in 12 meetings in T20Is.
The record is 5-1 in seven T20 World Cup clashes, a testament to their dominance.
Pakistan, renowned for their unpredictability, could turn the tables this time, adding an element of thrill and suspense to the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A dangal contest for the best cheering entourage between the Indian and Pakistani fans and a full house at Nassau County to witness the Men in Blue notch their second W of the season.
Others: Where: Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York
